nettoyage
func:
//msg.payload= 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. If the dog reacted, was it really lazy?';
let line=msg.payload
let delete_0='<one-of>'
let delete_1='</one-of>'
let delete_2='rule id="Swan" scope="public">'
let delete_3='<grammar version="1.0" xml:lang="fr-FR" mode="voice" root="Swan" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/06/grammar" tag-format="semantics/1.0">'
let delete_4='</grammar>'
let delete_5='<tag>out.action._attributes.info ="test";</tag>'
let delete_6='</rule>'
let delete_7='<tag>out.action=new Object(); </tag>'
let delete__="<item></item>"




if( line.includes(delete_7) ||line.includes(delete_7) || line.includes(delete_0) || line.includes(delete_1) || line.includes(delete_2) || line.includes(delete_3) || line.includes(delete_4) || line.includes(delete_5) || line.includes(delete_6))
{
    console.log("ici")
}
else
{
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
     line=line.replace('<item>', '')
    line=line.replace('</item>', '')
    msg.payload=line
    return msg 
}

func:
//msg.payload= 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. If the dog reacted, was it really lazy?';
let line=msg.payload
let delete_0='<one-of>'
let delete_1='</one-of>'
let delete_2='rule id="Swan" scope="public">'
let delete_3='<grammar version="1.0" xml:lang="fr-FR" mode="voice" root="Swan" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/06/grammar" tag-format="semantics/1.0">'
let delete_4='</grammar>'
let delete_5='<tag>out.action._attributes.info ="test";</tag>'
let delete_6='</rule>'
let delete_7='<tag>out.action=new Object(); </tag>'
let delete__="<item></item>"




if( line.includes(delete_7) ||line.includes(delete_7) || line.includes(delete_0) || line.includes(delete_1) || line.includes(delete_2) || line.includes(delete_3) || line.includes(delete_4) || line.includes(delete_5) || line.includes(delete_6))
{
}
else
{
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
    line=line.replace('\t', '')
     line=line.replace('<item>', '')
    line=line.replace('</item>', '')
    msg.payload=line
    return msg 
}
